https://www.thetimes.com/uk/crime/articl.title: M25 protests: activists block traffic for second day this week
https://www.thetimes.com/uk/crime/articl.text:
Protesters calling for the government to fund home insulation have brought parts of the M25 to a standstill for the second day in a week.
In a near replica of a demonstration on Monday, 89 activists for Insulate Britain set up roadblocks at six locations on the M25 in Surrey, Kent and Hertfordshire, causing miles of tailbacks.
Some have glued themselves to the tarmac in an effort to stymie attempts by police to forcibly remove them from the road, a spokeswoman for Insulate Britain said. As of 2pm, 71 people had been arrested.
The group, which has links to Extinction Rebellion (XR), said that it planned further motorway protests later in the week and would continue to occupy the roads until its demands are met.
